IDENTITY_SERVICE_ADMIN_EMAILS.description: Comma-separated list of emails who will get the 'admin' scope. Emails must be validated to receive this scope.

IDENTITY_SERVICE_DISABLE_RATE_LIMITING.description: Whether to disable rate limiting. Set to 'true' to disable.

IDENTITY_SERVICE_REQUIRE_EMAIL_VERIFICAT.description: Whether to require email verification for user accounts. Set to 'true' to require verification, 'false' to skip verification, or leave empty for default behavior.
